Intervention: Biopsy of lymph nodes with radiolabelled methylene blue
One diagnostic arm using 1 mCi blue dye Methylene 125-I to find sentinel lymph nodes
Eligibility: No allergy to iodine, lymphazurine or methylene blue dyes
A patient cannot be pregnant or breast-feeding
Women under 18 years of age will not be eligible
Patients with known allergy to iodine or to blue methylene or blue lymphazurine dyes
Results: The number of participants who have sentinel nodes that are radioactive or blue, or radioactive and blue, or who have efferent blue lymphatics leading to the sentinel knot(s)
Title of the arm/group: Biopsy of lymph nodes with radiolabelled methylene blue
Description of the arm/group: Diagnosis of an arm using 1 mCi blue dye Methylene 125-I to find sentinel lymph nodes
